Public Remarks: Spacious 2 bedroom 884 sq ft Manufactured home with privacy in the Capilano River park.  This home gives you an opportunity to live in it straight away with all New Kitchen Cabinets and stainless steel appliances. Enjoy walks along the Capilano River and a short walk to Park Royal. The Capilano River Park is a retirement style community and is 55+ only and does not allow rentals. One dog or cat allowed. This home also has a freestanding gas fireplace and outstanding outdoor space including excellent garden area. This freshly painted and clean home will make an excellent retirement property. All potential buyers must qualify and be approved by the Squamish Nation band office located adjacent to the park. Applications available upon request. Silver electrical seal approved and finalized!
Realtor Remarks: Easy to Show call John for Details.  55+, pets okay 1 dog or 1 cat, no rentals Squamish Band Approval for Park Occupancy.

The unit and complex were updated approx. 2008 and is located across from a school field with running track and playground. Public Remarks: Located in the sought-after 4th-Avenue-East residential area, this bi-level 3-bedroom home with a 3-bedroom downstairs suite is definitely one to consider. Situated on the water side of the street, with a city and harbour view, this property is ideal for a handy investor. Extra features include a newer asphalt-shingle roof, an unfinished basement, and a private location!

If you're looking for a home close to schools with some room to add your own touches, then this is definitely worth a look! Located within walking distance to all up-the-hill schools, this has so much potential for a young family. Inside, there are 3 bedrooms on the main floor with a large living area and a kitchen/dining area that is perfect for entertaining. The hardwood floors and wood windows have tons of character and just need a new owner to add a little bit of a facelift to make this house perfect!

Spectacular lodge style fully equipped studio suite (sleeps 4), with private deck tucked away on Blackcomb Mountain at Coast Blackcomb Suites. This is the ultimate ski in, ski out lodging! In the summer enjoy the proximity to top notch hiking and mountain bike trails, or our world renowned ski slopes in the Winter. Enjoy continental breakfast, gas fireplace, balcony, fully equipped kitchen, cable tv, and 2 hot tub's and heated pool (one of the largest in Whistler) carved into the mountain. This is a Phase 2 restricted property that allows for 56 days of owner use per year (28 summer/28 winter) with an on-site rental pool manager to handle the rentals for the remaining time. Realtor Remarks: Property is self-sustainable for year-round living. Electricity is generated in a creek, with generator backup. Water supply is from a spring. The house is not connected to sewer. It has a chemical toilet. Foundation is wooden posts on concrete pads.
